Articles.Content: What is the ***FIRST*** KSP mod that was ever created? Mechjeb? Hyperedit? B9? If anyone knows that would be great! KTHNXBI
I dunno but i'm fairly sure it was B9
I think it was one that added a Moon part that you could fly to orbit
First mod i think it was C7 spaceplane parts or the BF9000 engine
Oh there are some much older. Some of the Sunday Punch parts survive in NovaPunch, but there are many more that were abandoned.

> 
> I dunno but i'm fairly sure it was B9

WAT. No, it wasn't. In fact I find it to be pretty new compared to what I used in pre-0.14 times.

EDIT: I remeber using C7, NovaPunch ans some other things back in the days. One of them had an RC probe core that still functioned as a normal capsule and had kerbals in it. Someone even created a cannon that could be loaded only once. It was fun.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-12T23:25:06Z" title="04/12/2015 11:25  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 12, 2015</time> by Veeltch**

> 
> I dunno but i'm fairly sure it was B9

B9 is like the new guy! ok he's a suave new guy but there are lots that are way older. As ultrasquid said, there was Sunday Punch which then morphed into NovaPunch v1, DamnedRobotics became InfernalRobitics, Kethane has been around a fair while but even those are not some of the oldest.....oh god, I'm having flash-backs from when all mods used to be just dumped together in the Parts folder in one big ol' mess, glad those days are gone!

ErkleWarpClamp!! who remembers that! (I know, again not one of the oldest, but pre-dates stock docking. that was a great mod, I was sad when it wasn't needed anymore). 

MuMech HullCam, that's been around as long as I can remember

Was the first mod that red engine thingy?

Oh, so many flashbacks!

Oh, I have a few candidates.

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/wngfkkhbtjm4hp2/SIDR_Parts_1.3.zip?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/wngfkkhbtjm4hp2/SIDR_Parts_1.3.zip?dl=0) 

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/l0qa795jau4vy8f/landerparts_1.1.zip?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/l0qa795jau4vy8f/landerparts_1.1.zip?dl=0)

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/b8t4ty4vlud7a9k/Space%20Shuttle%20Vanguard%20-%200.1.zip?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/b8t4ty4vlud7a9k/Space%20Shuttle%20Vanguard%20-%200.1.zip?dl=0)

I believe SIDR was the first part *pack* after sunday punch's wobbly rockets? (both would later be scooped up by tiberion to form novapunch)

Capt'n Skunky's Pirate Pack is one of the oldest I can think of. And there was Sunday Punch. I think KW and C7 are a bit newer, but they were definitely around in the very early versions. Eh it's been a while. The mods were small and didn't add much, plus there was so little content in the game itself that there was almost no point. Nostalgia.

Plus the WayBack Machine doesn't seem to go back to 2011, but I don't really know how any of this works.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-13T04:02:35Z" title="04/13/2015 04:02  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 13, 2015</time> by mushroomman**

> 
> I believe SIDR was the first part *pack* after sunday punch's wobbly rockets? (both would later be scooped up by tiberion to form novapunch)

That Vanguard shuttle is triggering my nostalgia something fierce. I loved that thing back in the day, a much-belated thank you for making it. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

As I joined in 0.17, I didn't have the honor to play the earlier versions, which I find very cute! Anyways, one of the first part packs I ever installed were NovaPunch, KW Rocketry and CBBP's TKS pack (don't remember the exact name). Damned robotics too, but I was too new to the game to be able to anything with it, except building a big robotic arm which flipped over on the launch pad every time! Does anybody remember that mod with a green military truck and Russian UAZ jeep? Ahh, old days...

I started on June 13, 2013, and all I remember was clustering Jumbo-64s with Mainsails and BACCs, with Kethane and KW Rocketry. I couldn't even get to orbit then. I just liked the explosions. I didn't even know of the forums back then.

(sorry for posting in this necro'd thread, just had to share this)
